name: 3D 3D!
overview: 3D 3D! is a maze game where the player simply has to find his way out of the maze. The game is played from a first person perspective and the maze is three dimensional meaning it's designed as a cube with multiple levels. The player starts at the lowest level and has to get to the exit at level 10. A map can be used to show the player's position in the level and it's also possible to show the locations of shafts to the upper levels. A score is calculated based on how many steps the player takes and adds penalties for reading the map.
